name: Ruskindo - Learn Russian While Playing Game For Indonesians
name_original: Ruskindo - Learn Russian While Playing Game For Indonesians
description:
Hello, World! How's it goin'? Well, this is my first game on Itch.io and this is about learning russian language while playing game, I hope you enjoy :)

How to play this game?

1. You'll be brought to the first page where you can choose the level whatever you want

2. After that, the game will bring you to the second page where you can learn russian words. While in the second page where you can learn russian words for each level, you have to memorize the word given.

3. After memorizing the words, go hit other player to continue, then, here we go, you'll need to avoid the obstacles, such as, fire, etc.

4. After that, you'll be brought to the next level
